price: Sọ pé: “Ẹ sọ fún mi nípa àwọn n̄ǹkan tí Allāhu sọ̀kalẹ̀ fún yín nínú arísìkí, tí ẹ̀yin fúnra yín ṣe àwọn kan ní èèwọ̀ àti ẹ̀tọ́.” Sọ pé, “Ṣé Allāhu l’Ó yọ̀ǹda fún yín (láti ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ ni) tàbí ẹ̀ ń dá àdápa irọ́ mọ́ Allāhu?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ فَجَعَلۡتُم مِّنۡهُ حَرَامٗا وَحَلَٰلٗا قُلۡ ءَآللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُمۡۖ أَمۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum mā anzala al-lahu lakum min riz'qin fajaʿaltum min'hu ḥarāman waḥalālan qul āllahu adhina lakum am ʿalā al-lahi taftarūna
